title: Way to turn off arcade mode completely?
body:
I tried to create a thread, but can't locate it now; even double-checked in gameplay thread for it when I posted. I don't like the arcade aesthetic, and would like to turn it off. I see the option to turn off the map accents in video, but not the minions or game music. Would appreciate knowing how to do so.

Thanks!

replies.body:
No worries! We anticipated that some players prefer the good ol' times, so with this event we included a way to disable the new Arcade Assets on SR. Take a quick look at the screenshot and you should be able to turn that off!

https://i.gyazo.com/40ee4f659908eabd4208137e26b35778.png

Idk bout the minions but the music can be changed... access the settings go to sounds i think, then i reckon u should scroll down till u see this theme music thingy and it would say "updated", click it then switch to wutever u want.... i'll screenshot if i can sry for the low detail explanation.
Bump, the minions and music are still different with the "disable arcade map accents" box checked.

Thanks, but this doesn't change the minions or music. Have that feature turned off already. The map changes only partway. So I'm not sure if it is a bug or oversight, but its basically half old half new with that option selected.
